To ensure the safety and security of your funds, we have upgraded our encryption capabilities and implemented stricter fraud prevention measures. It is important to be vigilant and keep your personal information confidential. If you receive any suspicious emails or messages claiming to be from FirstBank, please do not disclose any sensitive data such as your SSN or passwords. Instead, contact our Fraud Department at for verification. For your convenience, we have included a few tips on how to identify and avoid phishing scams: 1. Be wary of emails with urgent requests for personal information or account details. 2. Always double-check the sender's email address to ensure it is legitimate. 3.
